overview:
Tony relentlessly applies the concepts of Time and Motion Study to optimize the efficiency of any and all Tasks we typical perform on Personal Computers and Mobile Devices.

Resulting from his mission as the Founder of his current Venture, iRelate.us, efficiency is added at every level as Users Browse the Web.

Tony is a hands-on, seasoned Software Technology Generalist who prides himself on being able to overcome all obstacles, technical or otherwise, to produce Software which manifests a significant Vision…

While spending most of his career as an entrepreneur he draws his early experience in OS Development and Marketing at Digital Equipment Corp and a stint as a troubleshooter within the original Microsoft Technology Center early in this Millenium.

Tony’s current mission and vision is to transform Browsing on all devices into an experience which truly personalizes the Web for every User and connects Users around the Globe based on their mutual Interests in Content. This effort will allow posts to the various Social Graphs to become part of an agnostic Global Social Interest Graph…
